mapper.select:
SELECT b.username as buyusername, a.tradeid, a.itemids, a.userids, a.buyuserid, a.paydate, a.createdate, a.updatedate, a.cost, a.totalcost, a.failure_msg, a.failuredate, a.transfer, a.sstatus FROM info_trade a LEFT JOIN info_user b ON b.userid=a.buyuserid WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.tradeid = #{tradeid}

SELECT b.username as buyusername, a.tradeid, a.itemids, a.userids, a.buyuserid, a.paydate, a.createdate, a.updatedate, a.cost, a.totalcost, a.failure_msg, a.failuredate, a.transfer, a.sstatus FROM info_trade a LEFT JOIN info_user b ON b.userid=a.buyuserid WHERE 1 = 1
AND b.username like CONCAT('%','${buyusername}','%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO info_trade ( itemids, userids, buyuserid, paydate, createdate, updatedate, cost, totalcost, failure_msg, failuredate, transfer, sstatus ) VALUES ( #{itemids}, #{userids}, #{buyuserid}, #{paydate}, #{createdate}, #{updatedate}, #{cost}, #{totalcost}, #{failure_msg}, #{failuredate}, #{transfer}, #{sstatus} )
